sentences.sContent: First-year students may elect  French, Spanish, or German.
sentences.sContent_eng: First-year students may elect French, Spanish, or German.
sentences.sCn: 一年级学生可选修法语、西班牙语或德语。

sentences.sContent: The English and the Spanish were among the first to colonize North America.
sentences.sContent_eng: The English and the Spanish were among the first to colonize North America.
sentences.sCn: 英国人和西班牙人是首先向北美洲开拓殖民地的。

sentences.sContent: At his lordship's death in the Spanish campaign in the year 1811,his estate fell in to the family of the Tiptoffs.
sentences.sContent_eng: At his lordship's death in the Spanish campaign in the year 1811,his estate fell in to the family of the Tiptoffs.
sentences.sCn: 这位爵爷在1811年西班牙战役中死亡后，他的产业归蒂普托夫家族支配。

synos.tran: 西班牙的；西班牙语的；西班牙人的

trans.tranOther: relating to Spain, its people, or its language
